title: penalty for dodging
body:
my little brother played in my account for some time while i was at work, when i back to play i saw on my honor level a lock with "because of recent penalties you lost access to rewards, he said that happened after he dodge some games. i can play the game normally but the missions and rewards are blocked.

my questions is:
can i see the penalty log  somewhere? i checked the mail and site with no success.

replies.body: You're always welcome to reach out to the player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you need to know what happened, but it'd also be good to read up on [**account sharing**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204214670) to help make sure this doesn't happen again!
